title: About Barna Karácsony
subtitle: Licensed Clinical Psychologist with over 15 years of experience helping individuals overcome challenges and achieve emotional wellness.
personal_note: "My approach combines evidence-based therapeutic techniques with genuine compassion. I believe in creating a collaborative partnership where you feel heard, understood, and empowered to make positive changes in your life."

office.title: A Comfortable, Welcoming Environment
office.description: My practice is designed to provide a calm, private space where you can feel comfortable sharing and exploring your thoughts and feelings.
